docs.description: Use this SMS template for notifying the customers, that their order is successfully placed.
docs.name: Online order placed

message.template:
Hi {{seller_name}},

You have received a new order on JioMarket for fulfilment - {{orderID}}.

Please login to the JioMarket Seller {{platform_url}} Portal to view order details.

Just to remind, SLA to accept the order is {{sla}} hours from order receipt and to dispatch the same is {{sla}} hours from order receipt.

docs.name: Last Day of Subscription
docs.description: Use this SMS template for notifying the sellers, that their subscription is over.

message.template: Your Fynd Platform {{planName}} plan is ending today! Why stop your e-commerce journey now? Renew your plan now.

docs.name: Days Before Subscription Ends
docs.description: Use this SMS template for notifying the customers, that their subscription will end T days.

message.template:
Your Fynd Platform {{planName}} plan is ending in {{TX}} days! 
Donâ€™t miss out! Renew your plan soon.

docs.description: Use this sms template to convey seller that a company store requires corrections.
docs.name: Company Store Correction

message.template: Hi {{ company_owner }}, Location details submitted by you for {{ store_name }} need correction - {{ corrections }}. Please log into JioMarket for more details {{ link }}

docs.description: Use this sms template to convey seller that a company legal documents require corrections.
docs.name: Company Legal Documents Correction

message.template: Hi {{ company_owner }}, Legal Documents submitted by you need correction - {{ corrections }}. Please log into JioMarket for more details {{ link }}

docs.description: Use this sms template to convey seller about a gated category document expiry.
docs.name: Company Gated Category License Expiry SMS

message.template: Hi {{ seller_name }}, Fssai License - {{ license_number }} submitted by you for location {{ selling_location_name }} will expire in 120 days. Please renew to avoid product suppression on JioMarket

docs.description: Use this sms template to convey seller that a company business details require corrections.
docs.name: Company Business Details Correction

message.template: Hi {{ company_owner }}, Business details submitted by you need correction - {{ corrections }}. Please log into JioMarket for more details {{ link }}

docs.description: Use this sms template to convey seller that a company brand has been rejected
docs.name: Company Brand Rejection

message.template: Hi {{ company_owner }}, Brand details submitted by you for {{ brand_name }} on JioMarket has been rejected due to {{ reject_reason }}

docs.name: Account Blocked
docs.description: Use this SMS template for notifying the customers, that their account is blocked.

message.template: Your Fynd Platform account has been blocked! You can no longer access your account unless you subscribe to a plan.

docs.name: Credit Balance Deducted
docs.description: Use this SMS template for notifying the sellers, that their Credit Balance Deducted.

message.template: Greetings from Fynd Platform. You have successfully made a transaction of â‚¹{{deduction}} using your credit balance.

points: View information about application and the company.
help-data.jumbotronBody: This section shows detailed information about the application in terms of its identity. Moreover, you can get the details of the company that owns this application. These data will assist for all future correspondence, which might require differentiating this application from others.

help-data.note: You can use announcements to notify your customers about new offers, current topics and trends.
points: You can schedule an announcement by setting a date-time.
You can restrict announcements to one or more pages.
help-data.jumbotronBody: Use this section to broadcast information to your customers on any page of the website. Customize the text, its colour and background, for the announcement. Moreover, you can select the platforms on which the announcement would appear; such as Android, iOS or Web.

help-data.note: Use Application ID and Token to authorize the use of APIs and SDKs
points: API stands for Application Programming Interface
SDK stands for Software Development Kit
help-data.jumbotronBody: Use this section to utilize platform APIs and SDKs that allow you to create systems and develop applications. Avail platform APIs to get data related to your e-commerce business. Moreover, you also get reusable SDK methods that support different programming languages.

points: Enter the application details (e.g. name of sales channel) that will be used in the meta fields i.e. title and description of all your web pages.
These details will be used by default unless you specify custom SEO fields for your web pages.

A delivery re-attempt will be made tomorrow again.{% if reschedule_form_link %} Click here to reschedule : {{reschedule_form_link}}{% endif %}
